assignment.address.controller

Class SearchScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment.address.controller.Controller
      • assignment.address.controller.SearchScreenController

  • public class SearchScreenController
extends Controller
    Controller to allow the user to search the AVLTree for either a specific Country, or by partners.

    • Method Detail

      • setNamesList

        public void setNamesList(javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> namesList)
        Sets the list of Country names.
        Parameters:
        namesList - Passed in to set the list.

      • handleOnTextSearch

        public void handleOnTextSearch()
        Called when the user clicks the Search button next to the text field. Retrieves the AVLTree from MainApp and calls the RetrieveCountryByName method after getting the text from the text field as the search parameter.

      • handleOnComboSearch

        public void handleOnComboSearch()
        Called when the user clicks the Search button next to the combo box. Retrieves the AVLTree from MainApp and calls the RetrieveCountryByName method after getting the text from the combo box selection and using it as the search parameter.

      • handlePartialSearch

        public void handlePartialSearch()
        Called when the user types in the text field. Retrieves the AVLTree from MainApp and calls the PredictiveSearch method. It updates the list of results each time the user presses a new key.

      • handleListViewChoice

        public void handleListViewChoice()
        Called when the user clicks one of the results from the PredictiveSearch list. Assigns the text in the text field to the chosen Country's name.

      • handleHomeClicked

        public void handleHomeClicked()
